2/15/2024 3:37:52 PM
Got this from joe to fix sharing isue.

If you are having trouble accessing the shared files in teams and when the co-heart try’s to share files they see’s you as a (contractor) then it would be a caching issue 

Resolution for this issue is 

1. Login to “[https://wnco.sharepoint.com /sites/SWALife](https://wnco.sharepoint.com/sites/SWALife)” and click on 9 dots on the top left ![](data:image/png;base64,)     

2. Ask your Co-heart to go to click on OneDrive and click on Settings gear on top right corner ![](data:image/png;base64,) 

3. Click on “OneDrive Settings”     
4. Click on “More Settings” on left navigation  
5. Click on “Site Collection Administrators” from Manage Access section 
6. Click on “site settings” gear on top right corner 
7. Click on “Site Settings” 
8. Click on “People and groups” 
9. Try to find your contractor profile and select the check box on left side 
10. Go to actions on top and select the option “Delete the user from site collection”.
